00036 public class BaseLiquibaseTask extends Task {
00037     private String changeLogFile;
00038     private String driver;
00039     private String url;
00040     private String username;
00041     private String password;
00042     protected Path classpath;
00043     private boolean promptOnNonLocalDatabase = false;
00044     private String currentDateTimeFunction;
00045     private String contexts;
00046     private String outputFile;
00047     private String defaultSchemaName;

00049     public BaseLiquibaseTask() {
00050         super();
00051         new LogRedirector(this).redirectLogger();
00052     }

00102     public Path createClasspath() {
00103         if (this.classpath == null) {
00104             this.classpath = new Path(getProject());
00105         }
00106         return this.classpath.createPath();
00107     }

00129     public Writer createOutputWriter() throws IOException {
00130         if (outputFile == null) {
00131             return null;
00132         }
00133         return new FileWriter(new File(getOutputFile()));
00134     }

00138             return null;

00151     protected Liquibase createLiquibase() throws Exception {
00152         FileOpener antFO = new AntFileOpener(getProject(), classpath);
00153         FileOpener fsFO = new FileSystemFileOpener();
00154 
00155         Database database = createDatabaseObject(getDriver(), getUrl(), getUsername(), getPassword(), getDefaultSchemaName());
00156         Liquibase liquibase = new Liquibase(getChangeLogFile().trim(), new CompositeFileOpener(antFO, fsFO), database);
00157         liquibase.setCurrentDateTimeFunction(currentDateTimeFunction);
00158 
00159         return liquibase;
00160     }
00161 
00162     protected Database createDatabaseObject(String driverClassName, String databaseUrl, String username, String password, String defaultSchemaName) throws Exception {
00163         String[] strings = classpath.list();
00164 
00165         final List<URL> taskClassPath = new ArrayList<URL>();
00166         for (String string : strings) {
00167             URL url = new File(string).toURL();
00168             taskClassPath.add(url);
00169         }
00170 
00171         URLClassLoader loader = AccessController.doPrivileged(new PrivilegedAction<URLClassLoader>() {
00172             public URLClassLoader run() {
00173                 return new URLClassLoader(taskClassPath.toArray(new URL[taskClassPath.size()]));
00174             }
00175         });
00176 
00177         if (driverClassName == null) {
00178             driverClassName = DatabaseFactory.getInstance().findDefaultDriver(databaseUrl);
00179         }
00180 
00181         if (driverClassName == null) {
00182             throw new JDBCException("driver not specified and no default could be found for "+databaseUrl);
00183         }
00184 
00185         Driver driver = (Driver) Class.forName(driverClassName, true, loader).newInstance();
00186 
00187         Properties info = new Properties();
00188         info.put("user", username);
00189         info.put("password", password);
00190         Connection connection = driver.connect(databaseUrl, info);
00191 
00192         if (connection == null) {
00193             throw new JDBCException("Connection could not be created to " + databaseUrl + " with driver " + driver.getClass().getName() + ".  Possibly the wrong driver for the given database URL");
00194         }
00195 
00196         Database database = DatabaseFactory.getInstance().findCorrectDatabaseImplementation(connection);
00197         database.setDefaultSchemaName(defaultSchemaName);
00198 
00199         return database;
00200     }
00201

00203         return contexts;

00206     public void setContexts(String cntx) {

00210 
00214     protected static class LogRedirector {
00215 
00216         private final Task task;
00217 
00223         protected LogRedirector(Task task) {
00224             super();
00225             this.task = task;
00226         }
00227 
00228         protected void redirectLogger() {
00229             registerHandler(createHandler());
00230         }
00231 
00232         protected void registerHandler(Handler theHandler) {
00233             Logger logger = LogFactory.getLogger();
00234             for (Handler handler : logger.getHandlers()) {
00235                 logger.removeHandler(handler);
00236             }
00237             logger.addHandler(theHandler);
00238             logger.setUseParentHandlers(false);
00239         }
00240 
00241 
00242         protected Handler createHandler() {
00243             return new Handler() {
00244                 public void publish(LogRecord logRecord) {
00245                     task.log(logRecord.getMessage(), mapLevelToAntLevel(logRecord.getLevel()));
00246                 }
00247 
00248                 @Override
00249                 public void close() throws SecurityException {
00250                 }
00251 
00252                 @Override
00253                 public void flush() {
00254                 }
00255 
00256                 protected int mapLevelToAntLevel(Level level) {
00257                     if (Level.ALL == level) {
00258                         return Project.MSG_INFO;
00259                     } else if (Level.SEVERE == level) {
00260                         return Project.MSG_ERR;
00261                     } else if (Level.WARNING == level) {
00262                         return Project.MSG_WARN;
00263                     } else if (Level.INFO == level) {
00264                         return Project.MSG_INFO;
00265                     } else {
00266                         return Project.MSG_VERBOSE;
00267                     }
00268                 }
00269             };
00270         }
00271 
00272     }
00273 
00274     protected boolean shouldRun() {
00275         String shouldRunProperty = System.getProperty(Liquibase.SHOULD_RUN_SYSTEM_PROPERTY);
00276         if (shouldRunProperty != null && !Boolean.valueOf(shouldRunProperty)) {
00277             log("LiquiBase did not run because '" + Liquibase.SHOULD_RUN_SYSTEM_PROPERTY + "' system property was set to false");
00278             return false;
00279         }
00280         return true;
00281     }
00282 
00283     protected void closeDatabase(Liquibase liquibase) {
00284         if (liquibase != null && liquibase.getDatabase() != null && liquibase.getDatabase().getConnection() != null) {
00285             try {
00286                 liquibase.getDatabase().close();
00287             } catch (JDBCException e) {
00288                 log("Error closing database: "+e.getMessage());
00289             }
00290         }
00291     }
